Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Card-RF
Mod.Author: Ducladoncladon & Hobbitdur
Mod.Description: Card-RF is a graphical update to the beloved Triple Triad minigame! Which can now be played in full 60 FPS thanks to FFNx! Using original reference artworks from Final Fantasy 8 and higher, and a combination of AI upscaling and many hours of manual touch ups and corrections, we have brought this amazing minigame to a more modern appearance. Available in English, Italian, Spanish, French and German! More info on discord: https://discord.gg/tsunamods-community-277610501721030656
